original_text: When the new law reached every region and every city, the Jews became very happy. The other people who lived there were now afraid of the Jews. Because of that, many people said that they themselves had become Jews.
korean_text: 왕의 어명이 이르는 각 지방, 각 읍에서 유다인들이 즐기고 기뻐하여 잔치를 베풀고 그 날을 명절로 삼으니 본토 백성이 유다인을 두려워하여 유다인 되는 자가 많더라

sentences.original_text: When the new law reached every region
sentences.korean_translation: 새로운 법이 모든 지역에 도달했을 때

sentences.original_text: The other people who lived there
were now afraid of the Jews
that they themselves had become Jews
